mapper.select: SELECT msg_id, receive_staff_id, send_staff_id, msg_title, msg_content, msg_type, receive_time, msg_state, msg_state_time, is_top, msg_url FROM sys_message where msg_id = #{msg_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_message ( msg_id, receive_staff_id, send_staff_id, msg_title, msg_content, msg_type, receive_time, msg_state, msg_state_time, is_top, msg_url ) VALUES ( #{msg_id}, #{receive_staff_id}, #{send_staff_id}, #{msg_title}, #{msg_content}, #{msg_type}, #{receive_time}, #{msg_state}, #{msg_state_time}, #{is_top}, #{msg_url} )
